subprocess_flow.description: Clearly define the scope of the business architecture effort, including the organizational units, geographies, and business functions to be covered. This involves identifying the key stakeholders and their expectations, as well as establishing the boundaries of the architecture domain. The scope should align with the architecture vision and strategic objectives.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To establish the boundaries and focus of the business architecture effort.

subprocess_flow.description: Create a comprehensive business capabilities model that represents the organization’s key functions and activities. This model should be hierarchical, with high-level capabilities decomposed into more granular sub-capabilities. The capabilities model should be technology-agnostic and focus on what the business does, not how it does it. It serves as a foundation for aligning IT investments with business strategy.
success_criteria: Comprehensive and accurate business capabilities model
subprocess_flow.purpose: To provide a structured view of the organization’s business functions.

subprocess_flow.description: Develop a value stream map that illustrates the end-to-end flow of activities required to deliver value to customers. This map should identify the key steps, actors, and information flows involved in the value stream. It should also highlight any bottlenecks, inefficiencies, or pain points in the process. The value stream map provides insights into how the organization creates value and identifies opportunities for improvement.
success_criteria: Accurate and detailed value stream map
subprocess_flow.purpose: To visualize the flow of value creation within the organization.

step_risks_and_controls.control: Detailed analysis of value stream components

subprocess_flow.description: Analyze the organization’s key business processes to understand their structure, inputs, outputs, and dependencies. This analysis should identify any redundancies, inefficiencies, or gaps in the processes. It should also assess the alignment of the processes with the business capabilities and value streams. The process analysis provides insights into how the organization operates and identifies opportunities for process improvement and optimization.
success_criteria: Comprehensive analysis of key business processes
subprocess_flow.purpose: To understand and improve the organization’s business processes.

subprocess_flow.description: Compile all the artifacts and findings from the previous sub-steps into a comprehensive Business Architecture Document. This document should include the business architecture scope, capabilities model, value stream map, process analysis report, and any other relevant information. The document should be well-organized, clearly written, and easily accessible to stakeholders. It serves as a reference guide for understanding the organization’s business architecture and aligning IT investments with business strategy.
success_criteria: Complete and accurate Business Architecture Document
subprocess_flow.purpose: To create a comprehensive record of the organization’s business architecture.
